div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 215 Carystus, Euboea, c. 1930? Burial: late 3rd-early 2nd cent. B.C. Contents: 5 AR Euboean League: 1 tetradr. 1 didr. Carystus: 2 didr. (1 cow-calf, 1 royal hd.) ANS 1978.82.44 1 dr. Disposition: M. Wallace, Toronto Wallace, NNM 134 (1956), p. 54, no. 7 Wallace saw other coins from the hd. (Carystus didr., dr. ?). In Essays Robin- son, p. 205, note 1 he suggests that this find may be part of no. 210 above
